interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Face Cradle Cover - APPEARUS Massage Fitted Headrest Covers (6 Count/BD1005x6)
Review Date: 2013/07/12
Store: APPEARUS
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'APPEARUS', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Machine Wash', 'Package Dimensions': '11.9 x 4.2 x 1.2 inches; 1.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '794168357655'}
Review Text: I purchased this cover January 17, 2011 when I started massage therapy school. I will also mention that when I made my purchase, it was sold as one cover for $8.50. It is a very long lasting cover! Not only did it survive 7 months of use in school, it has been part of my cover collection used for almost 2 years in my practice. It has been laundered and has held up beautifully - no rips, tears, fading or loss of softness. I am considering purchasing more now as my clientele has grown. With the current offer of $32 for a pack of 6, that makes each cover only a little over $5 each. With the track record the one I already have has, I am more than confident in purchasing more!
Review Title: Lasts and Lasts
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

The user demonstrates a preference for durable, high-quality massage accessories, specifically headrest covers. Their experience indicates a strong commitment to massage therapy, participating in both education and practice, suggesting a professional level of engagement in this field. The user values longevity and cost-effectiveness, as evidenced by their satisfaction with the product's durability over two years of active use and consideration of bulk purchasing to accommodate a growing clientele. They appreciate practical features such as machine washability, highlighting a preference for low-maintenance items. Their consistent positive rating reflects a discerning taste for reliable products that withstand wear and tear in a professional setting. Overall, the user exhibits a trend towards investing in products that enhance their therapy practice, favoring functionality, and value in their purchases.
